title: Corruptbox 3 x Sprunki
description: Corruptbox 3 x Sprunki is a chaotic music creation game where sound and visuals come together. Become a crazy music mixer now!

Explore the chaotic and creative world of music in Corruptbox 3xSprunki!

Corruptbox 3 x Sprunki is a unique fan-made version in the creative music game series, where players are free to mix sounds, characters, and effects to create quirky and fun music in their style. It’s the perfect choice for anyone who wants to break away from traditional music rules. With its unique glitchy style, simple interface, and complete creative freedom, the game lets you release your creative energy and enjoy music in your own way.

The game has no “right” or “wrong,” only your unlimited creativity in this chaotic world. Experience crazy music in your style now!

Guide to Exploring Music in Your Own Way

  • Create unique melodies: Drag and drop characters onto the soundboard to make them sing, create beats, or add glitch effects.
  • Combine sound layers: Mix multiple characters at the same time to create multi-layered music, from calm to chaotic.
  • Explore unusual visual effects: Each character and action triggers unique visual or glitch effects.
  • Customize creatively: Change speed, pitch, and effects to create a completely unique music style; the stranger, the better.

Game controls

  • Select characters: Use the left mouse button to select character icons or sound icons.
  • Drag and drop onto the stage: Drop beat blocks onto characters on the stage to activate their sounds.
  • Mute/unmute sounds: Click a character again to mute or change effects.
  • Create your own mix: Combine multiple characters with different speeds and pitches to create your personal track.
  • Reset everything: Use the “Clear” or “Restart” button to start a new mix.

  • Sprunki: Fall Edition
  • Sprunki Clicker
